productName: Oregon Scientific MP120/BL256C 256 MB Waterproof MP3 Player with FM Tuner Black

fullText: purchased player sole purpose using swim laps disappointed ive using weeks little player complaint difficult earbuds positioned correctly afraid popped swimming im earbuds stay didnt pull swim cap help secure remove rubber earbuds allow dry regular headphones player dont waterproof feature overall im happy player
